data.title: Obituary for Stephen L. Hutton
data.meta_description: Stephen Hutton | Passed away on Jul 29, 2017 | Stephen L. Hutton, 44, of York Haven, passed away... Learn More
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Stephen  L. Hutton | Cocklin Funeral Home
data.text:
Stephen L. Hutton, 44, of York Haven, passed away Saturday, July 29, 2017, at the Select Specialty Hospital, Camp Hill.

Stephen was born March 17, 1973 in Harrisburg the son of Charles J. Hutton of Mechanicsburg and the late Sharon L. (Cromer) Hutton.

He was employed with Home Depot for fourteen years in the Customer Service Department. Stephen was an avid Penn State fan and enjoyed watching Penn State football.

Stephen is survived by his father, Charles J. Hutton and his wife Cookie A. Hutton of Mechanicsburg; his wife, Bonnie M. Burger of York Haven; seven sisters, Gena Drew of Carlisle, Vicki Snyder of Mechanicsburg, Kim Shannon of Camp Hill, Kris Hockensmith and Lisa Stare both of Mechanicsburg, DeAnn McCloskey of Camp Hill, and Jen Miller of Mt. Bethel.

Services will be held Thursday, August 3, 2017, at 11:00 am in the Cocklin Funeral Home, Inc., 30 N. Chestnut St., Dillsburg. Burial will follow in the Dillsburg Cemetery-Mountain Road. A viewing will be held Thursday from 10-11 am at the funeral home. The family would like to encourage everyone to wear their favorite Penn State attire.

In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to the Tri County Society for Children, 124 Pine St., Harrisburg, PA 17101.
